text: Egha me pauran mughuriar aghuim ko olivɨn borem deravɨra da verezɨ, borer mughuriar aghuim oto, mati sanda. Olivɨn borer kam, an ingangarim kamakɨn: me bizim o gumazim Ikiavɨra Itir God bagh anemɨsɨvɨsɨ, borer kam a gingam. Me uaghan pauran mughuriar aghuim zuir mabar ingari, mati gumazir fofozir aghuim itim deravɨra da verezɨ, sandan aghuim oto.
